mechanoreception.notes: Mites generally rely on mechanoreception to detect prey and navigate their environment. This is inferred due to their predatory behavior and general mite biology.

chemoreception.notes: Mites use chemoreception to locate prey and potential mates. This is inferred due to their predatory behavior and general mite biology.

vision.notes: The presence and capabilities of vision in Phytoseiidae are not mentioned in the provided context.
